body.p: Covington, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Joseph Wasson and Sarah Hearne Wasson. Married to Sarah “Sallie” Russell Wasson. Father of Mary J. Wasson. Farmer in Bourbon County in 1850. Owned nine enslaved persons in Bourbon County in 1850. Resident of Covington in 1860. Speculator in Bourbon County in 1863.
